name: Terranet
tagline: We create smart & effective digital products
description:
Terranet is an upscale IT company specializing in complex development, design, and support of all kinds of web applications. 
 
We have in-house capabilities in website planning, design, programming and SEO. We routinely build custom online applications with complex requirements. In addition, we perform part of these services in partnership with other companies, such as design agencies.
 
Our team is consisted of web enthusiasts focused on delivering quality over quantity.
We enjoy a good healthy process and often develop long-lasting, friendly & trustful relationships with start-ups from USA, Australia, Netherlands, Sweden, Switzerland, Russia & Romania.
 
You can visit our website: www.terranet.md and find out more about us.
